title: Fix manual dispatch for Discord workflow
author: Itachi-1824

gist.summary: Fixed the manual dispatch mechanism for the Discord notification workflow by adding API fallbacks for missing environment variables.
gist.impact: Internal workflows can now be triggered manually without failing due to missing context.
gist.visual_concept: A bee mechanic fixing a pipeline that connects to a chat bubble. Represents the internal fix to the social workflow.
gist.image_prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of a tiny bee mechanic fixing a small pipeline connected to a pixelated chat bubble. Soft lime green (#ecf874) and pastel gradient background. Chunky retro sprites, warm lighting, lo-fi vibes like Stardew Valley. Emotionally warm, fixing the connection.

image.prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of a tiny bee mechanic fixing a small pipeline connected to a pixelated chat bubble. Soft lime green (#ecf874) and pastel gradient background. Chunky retro sprites, warm lighting, lo-fi vibes like Stardew Valley. Emotionally warm, fixing the connection.
